author: marcinds
content: <@340345049063882753> It's not a reason, all txs sent by me have had max fee per blob gas = 1, so it is not competing with any more expensive (in terms of blob gas) tx. They were sent only to fill client's blob pools to the limit. There is some other spamming, I observed high (and rising) blob base fee during my experiment
